title: Manassas National Battlefield Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       News Releases - Current news about Manassas National Battlefield Park.   Manassas National Battlefield Park, a unit of the National Park Service, will be hosting a Youth Conservation Corp (YCC) work team during the summer of 2016. For over 25 years, youth from the area have worked on various park resources by repairing trail surfaces, assisting with repairs to historic structures, and performing natural resources projects. This year's program will run from June 19 through August 12, 2016. Applications will be accepted from March 11, 2016 through April 15, 2016. Click here for the application.  To be eligible, you must have had your 15th birthday by June 19 but not have your 19th birthday before August 12. Completed applications should be submitted to: ATTN: YCC Coordinator Manassas National Battlefield Park 12521 Lee Highway Manassas, VA 20109
